title: Olivia Blake – 2022 Comments on the Language Used by Suella Braverman
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Olivia Blake, the Labour MP for Sheffield Hallam, on Twitter on 1 November 2022.
content: Suella Braverman is not fit for office.
Political decisions she made have left children in dangerous, inhumane conditions in Manston.
And yday she described asylum seekers as an “invasion”, the day after a petrol bomb attack on a migrant centre.
